about_the_game:
We've teamed up with cosplayer Rana for this official cosplay set of Noelle from Noelle Does Her Best! by Aprico Koubou!

This Cosplay DLC includes images of a cosplayer cosplaying as Noelle from the game.

Features:
  • Cosplay images of Noelle
detailed_description:
Latest Release


Upcoming Games


About the Game

We've teamed up with cosplayer Rana for this official cosplay set of Noelle from Noelle Does Her Best! by Aprico Koubou!

This Cosplay DLC includes images of a cosplayer cosplaying as Noelle from the game.

Features:
  • Cosplay images of Noelle
legal_notice: © Kagura Games and Aprico Koubou, All Rights Reserved
name: Noelle Does Her Best! - Official Noelle Cosplay by Rana

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

short_description: If you're a fan of Noelle from Noelle Does Her Best!, don't miss out on this official cosplay of Noelle by Rana!
